sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.sentence: Wrapped in a suffocating cloud of thick smoke, Athens woke up on Wednesday to more wildfires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Greek authorities in the capital say they are most concerned about the inferno near Mount Parnes and the national park here is in danger of going up in flames.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: So far this new bout of wildfires has claimed the lives of 20 people and officials have issued new evacuation orders.

sentences.sentence: The Alexandropoyas region in the northeast of the country is most affected and there is no sign of these flames slowing down.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.sentence: Germany's cabinet on Wednesday approved a plan to make it easier for transgender, intersex

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: and non-binary people to change their name and gender in official documents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
